TopicTitle: Will KSP go from 32 Bit to 64 bit in the next update?

Articles.Content:
I've been hearing people talking about this and a unity update or something.

Does this mean we'll be able to use more ram ingame?

Or if this thing is true at all?
I think that is one of the features of Unity 5, but I don't think it will be included in 0.24
In short - no, it won't. Currently there are no plans to implement Unity 5, but the devs are very excited for what it may bring. That said, I'm closing this thread as this topic is a frequent one.
